headline: Cramer’s Take on Advanced Micro Devices (AMD): Is the AI Chipmaker Losing Its Edge?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 7 Stocks that Jim Cramer Recently Discussed. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: Wolfspeed vs. AMD
summary: Seemingly overnight, artificial intelligence became a major growth industry.  The AI boom is driving demand for semiconductors, which are crucial components in AI systems.  Two compelling semiconductor companies to consider are Wolfspeed (NYSE: WOLF) and Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD).
